questions.question: What is a dog?
questions.details: The dog is characterized by an upturning tail. The dog derived from an ancient, extinct wolf, and the modern grey wolf is the dog's nearest living relative.
questions.shortAns: It is a domesticated descendant of the wolf.

questions.question: Is a train characterized by a rail transport?
questions.details: It is a form of transport consisting of a series of connected vehicles that generally run along a railroad track to transport passengers or cargo. The word train comes from the Old French trahiner, derived from the Latin trahere meaning

questions.question: What is Inflation?
questions.details: The rate at which purchasing power drops can be reflected in the average price increase of a basket of selected goods and services over some period of time.

questions.question: Is too much Inflation bad?
questions.details: While high inflation can be harmful, too little inflation can also weaken the economy.

questions.question: Is reading books helpful?
questions.details: it improves your focus, memory, empathy, and communication skills. It can reduce stress, improve your mental health, and help you live longer. Reading also allows you to learn new things to help you succeed in your work and relationships.
